fr.gouv.vitam.processing.management.api

Interface ProcessManagement

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AutoCloseable, ProcessLifeCycle, VitamAutoCloseable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ProcessManagementImpl

    public interface ProcessManagement
extends ProcessLifeCycle, VitamAutoCloseable
    ProcessManagement interface This service will be invoked by Ingest Module
